about_the_game:
Welcome to the ultimate rugby video game experience, Rugby 25! Whether you're a seasoned pro or new to the sport, Rugby 25 immerses you in the fast-paced, hard-hitting action like no rugby video game before it. From the grassroots of local clubs through to the grand stages of the world’s biggest international tournaments, every detail has been meticulously crafted to bring the excitement and intensity of the sport to your hands. Rugby 25 is where legends will be born and history made.

PLAY NOW IN EARLY ACCESS

Rugby 25 is now available in Early Access on Steam. This Early Access phase will not only allow purchasers to enjoy the game ahead of its full release, it also empowers them to influence its development direction. With promising feedback and a growing player base, Rugby 25 Early Access sets the stage for a groundbreaking entry into the world of rugby gaming, creating the most comprehensive Rugby video game of all time.


Upon Early Access release, teams will not be final, nor will the players have their photogrammetry likeness integrated into the game. As the Early Access period progresses, teams and players will have their names and likeness updated and integrated into the game.

Upon final release, Rugby 25 will include over 140 International Teams including New Zealand, South Africa, England, France and Australia, plus over 150 Club Sides in 11 Competitions with URC, English Premiership Rugby, French Top 14, MLR and Super Rugby.

legal_notice: Rugby 25 ©2024 Published by Nacon and developed by Big Ant Studios. All right reserved. All stadiums, tournaments, player names and appearances, outfits and brands are the properties of their respective owners.
name: Rugby 25

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) or Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100 (3.1GHz) / AMD FX 6300 (3.5Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX770 (4 GB) / AMD Radeon R9 270 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these informations aren't final and may be subject to change until the launch of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) or Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600k (3.5GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1660 Ti (6 GB) / AMD RX 5700XT (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these informations aren't final and may be subject to change until the launch of the game.

short_description: Welcome to the ultimate rugby video game experience, Rugby 25! From club sides through to the world’s biggest international tournaments, every detail has been meticulously crafted to bring the excitement and intensity of the sport to your hands.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
